column4: hello I am trying to upgrade from 7.04 to 7.10 using the cd. followed these steps: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/GutsyUpgrades but get a error
and the error is 2008-07-17 16:03:49,222 ERROR Dist-upgrade failed: 'A essential package would have to be removed'
you need the alternate cd to upgrade versions not a live..
